name: Touch Battle Tank 3D
synopsis: In Touch Battle Tank 3D, it's you on a solo mission against a nearly unstoppable army of killer tanks. Your strategy - keep the action going and the shells flying! Command either a powerfully armoured engine of destruction or a light, agile hit-and-run variety of menacing machines capable of unleashing incredible firepower! The pick-up-and-play ease allows you to use the Circle Pad to pilot your 3D tank and the Touch Screen to take aim in red-hot combat action! Skillfully charge through the multiple battle stages as you face increasing weaponry and constant bombardment. The enemies just keep getting bigger and more determined to crush you. Show them all that when the dust settles, you will be victorious and own the medals to prove it! Features: - 50 original stages of combat - 20 additional Bonus Stages - Medals awarded for heroic victories - Quick-to-learn compelling gameplay - Power or Speed type tanks
